content.title: Second Stretch Goal Unlocked
content.creator:
Comet
February 25, 2025
content.content:
Dear Comet Backers, 
We're excited to announce that we've reached our second stretch goal of $100,00! This means every backer will receive a free protective pouch with their Comet TB5 SSD.
The protective pouch is for keeping your Comet TB5 SSD safe during transport and daily use. Made with durable materials, it offers excellent protection against scratches and minor impacts while maintaining a slim profile that won't add bulk to your gear bag. 
With this milestone achieved, we're now pushing toward our next stretch goal of $150,000 which will unlock three premium color variants: Red + Black Top, Titanium + Silver Top, and the all-Titanium edition. 
Thank you for your incredible support in helping us reach this milestone. We're grateful for your trust and enthusiasm in the Comet TB5 SSD project. 
Best regards, 
The Comet Team

content.title: First Stretch Goal Unlocked and New Add-on
content.creator:
Comet
February 18, 2025
content.content:
Dear Comet Backers,
We're thrilled to announce that we've reached our first stretch goal of $50,000! Thanks to your incredible support, we can now offer two additional color combinations for the Comet TB5 SSD: Black + Silver Top and Black + Black Top.
These new color options will be available to all backers during the post-campaign survey, where you'll be able to select your preferred color combination. The original Black + Titanium Top remains available as well.
With this milestone achieved, we're now setting our sights on our next stretch goal: the free protective pouch at $100,000. We're excited to see what we can accomplish together!
At this time we are also releasing a new add-on: a phone case for iPhones (15Pro, 15Pro Max, 16Pro, 16Pro Max). This phone case will help you keep the Comet TB5 SSD in place while you shoot videos in up to 4K/120fps ProRes with zero frame drops. The new add-on will be available at US$29 and it includes the phone case an USB C to C connector. This makes Comet TB5 SSD the perfect companion for mobile filmmaking. 
Thank you for your continued support and enthusiasm,
The Comet Team

content.title: Introducing Stretch Goals!
content.creator:
Comet
February 10, 2025
content.content:
Dear Comet Backers,
We're excited to announce our stretch goals for the Comet TB5 SSD campaign! Your incredible support has motivated us to offer even more value and options for all our backers.
Here's what we have planned:
At $50,000, we'll introduce two stunning new color combinations: Black + Silver Top and Black + Black Top. These sleek options will complement our original Titanium + Black Top design perfectly.
When we reach $100,000, every backer will receive a free protective pouch with their Comet TB5 SSD, ensuring your device stays safe and pristine wherever you go.
Finally, at $150,000, we'll unlock three premium variants: Red + Black Top, Titanium + Silver Top, and the ultimate all-Titanium edition.
Each stretch goal represents our commitment to delivering more value while maintaining the exceptional quality you expect from Comet. We can't wait to unlock these goals together!
Thank you for your continued support,
The Comet Team

content.title: Funded in 1 Hour!
content.creator:
Comet
February 3, 2025
content.content:
Dear Comet Backers,
We are absolutely thrilled to announce that Comet reached its funding goal in just one hour after launch!
This incredible milestone demonstrates the amazing support and enthusiasm from all of you. This rapid success not only validates our concept but also energizes our team to deliver an exceptional product that will exceed your expectations. 
As we continue this journey, we'll keep you updated on our progress and the exciting stretch goals we have planned. Each one of you who backed us at this stage has played a crucial role in making Comet a reality. 
Stay tuned for more updates as we work diligently to bring Comet to life!
With gratitude,
The Comet Team
